name: Polygon Airplane Physics Web Demo
description:
Demo version for pre-buying test purposes. Try the physics and all the mechanics yourself before you buy the asset!

Asset link : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/polygon-airplane-physics-197...

Simple and Intuitive Airplane Physics. Ready to fly in 5 minutes!

You can take advantage of the highly-detailed demo model with UI which is already waiting for you and is ready to fly or you can use your own plane and make it fly in less then 5 minutes! Get creative and make perfect handling for your airplane and this asset will help you with that!
